dcterms:creator: D. Becker
U.-C. Fiebig
L. M. Schalk
dcterms:description: This dataset provides a model for the Drone-to-Drone communications channel specifically designed for urban environments, aiding in the evaluation and validation of various communication concepts and datalink candidates through simulations.
dcterms:title: Drone-to-Drone Channel Model for Urban Environments

dcterms:creator: D. Becker
L. Schalk
dcterms:description: This dataset includes wideband channel measurements conducted between small unmanned aerial vehicles, focusing on the characteristics of air-to-air communication.
dcterms:title: Wideband Channel Measurements

dcterms:creator: D. Becker
U.-C. Fiebig
L. M. Schalk
dcterms:description: This dataset presents findings from wideband channel measurements for low altitude drone-to-drone links in urban scenarios, providing insights into the communication characteristics in such environments.
dcterms:title: Wideband Channel Measurements and Findings

dcterms:creator: D. Becker
U.-C. Fiebig
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on the measurement-based identification of multipath components (MPCs) in urban drone-to-drone propagation scenarios, contributing to the understanding of signal behavior in complex environments.
dcterms:title: Measurement Based Identification of MPCs

dcterms:description: This dataset provides propagation data and prediction methods required for the design of terrestrial broadband radio access systems operating in a frequency range from 3 to 60 GHz.
dcterms:title: ITU-R Recommendation P.1410

dcterms:creator: A. Perrig
R. Canetti
J. D. Tygar
D. Song
dcterms:description: This dataset describes the TESLA Broadcast Authentication Protocol, which is used for securing communications in various applications.
dcterms:title: GBAS Transmission

dcterms:creator: N. Maurer
T. Graupl
M. A. Bellido-Manganell
D. M. Mielke
A. Filip-Dhaubhadel
O. Heirich
D. Gerbeth
M. Felux
L. M. Schalk
D. Becker
N. Schneckenburger
M. Schnell
dcterms:description: This dataset documents the flight trial demonstration of secure GBAS via the L-band Digital Aeronautical Communications System (LDACS), showcasing the implementation of secure communication methods.
dcterms:title: Secure GBAS Transmission
